result.name: seedbed-update-august-2015
result.notes: Dataset that describes the activities of the Seedbed Accelerator programme in accordance with the SIF requirements

organization.name: seedbed
organization.title: SEEDbed
organization.description:
The data shows incubator and venture level detail about the Social Incubator Fund, a £10m fund administered by BIG, which supports social incubators to help them provide investment and support to early stage social ventures in the UK. The data is available for all live incubators and is updated by the incubators themselves. This data has been submitted by SEEDbed. A data visualization platform of the Cabinet Office 

Investment Readiness Programme can be viewed here: http://data.gov.uk/data/viz/investment-readiness-programme

More details at http://www.seedbedenterprise.co.uk/

result.title: Seedbed Update August 2015
